content: Looking specifically at the Theravance field sales deployment efforts on Slide 8, in Q1 of 2022, doses sold exclusively in the hospital setting represented a year-over-year increase of 73.2% from Q1 of 2021 and an increase of 4.3% from the prior quarter demonstrating the highest quarter volume launch to date. The ampreloxetine Phase 3 program included three studies, Study 0169, Study 0170 and the open-label extension Study 0171, and enrolled patients with Parkinson’s disease, multiple system atrophy or MSA and pure autonomic failure. GSK noted that TRELEGY continued to lead the market as a single inhaler triple therapy with year-over-year global sales growth of 33%, generating global net sales of $454 million during the first quarter of 2022.
